data.Sentence: --- Lesson 25  Do the English speak English?
I arrived in London at last.
The railway station was big, black and dark.

data.Sentence_cn: 我不知道去饭店的路该怎么走，于是向一个搬运工打听。
data.Sentence: I did not know the way to my hotel, so I asked a porter.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的英语讲得不但非常认真，而且咬字也非常清楚。
data.Sentence: I not only spoke English very carefully, but very clearly as well.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而搬运工却不明白我的话。
data.Sentence: The porter, however, could not understand me.

data.Sentence_cn: 我把问话重复了很多遍。他终于听懂了。
data.Sentence: I repeated my question several times and at last he understood.

data.Sentence_cn: 他回答了，但他讲得既不慢也不清楚。
data.Sentence: he answered me, but he spoke neither slowly nor clearly.

data.Sentence_cn: 于是他说得慢了，可我还是听不懂。
data.Sentence: Then he spoke slowly, but I could not understand him.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的老师从来不那样讲英语！
data.Sentence: My teacher never spoke English like that!
The porter and I looked at each other and smiled.

data.Sentence_cn: 接着，他说了点什么，这回我听懂了。
data.Sentence: Then he said something and I understood it.

data.Sentence_cn: “ 您会很快学会英语的！”他说。
我感到奇怪。在英国，人们各自说着一种不同的语言。
data.Sentence: I wonder. In England, each person speaks a different language.

data.Sentence_cn: 英国人之间相互听得懂，可我却不懂他们的话！
data.Sentence: The English understand each other, but I don't understand them!
